Flow.description: ... purges configured B2C Commerce CustomerLists and Sites from the Salesforce Platform.
Flow.interviewLabel: B2C Commerce: Delete CustomerLists and Sites {!$Flow.CurrentDateTime}
Flow.label: B2C Commerce: Delete CustomerLists and Storefronts

subflows.description: ... deletes all B2C Commerce CustomerList definitions -- and completes the removal of all Site and CustomerList definitions.
subflows.name: Delete_B2C_Commerce_CustomerLists
subflows.label: Delete B2C Commerce CustomerLists

subflows.description: ... deletes all B2C Commerce storefront definitions -- prior to deleting customerList definitions.
subflows.name: Delete_B2C_Commerce_Sites
subflows.label: Delete B2C Commerce Sites
